Package org.mindswap.owls.process

Interface Summary
AnyOrder AnyOrder consists of a bag of processes which are executed in any order, i.e., without precedence order (but not concurrently).
AsProcess AsProcess turns an arbitrary control construct into a "local process" that is called at the point it is defined.
AtomicProcess  
Choice Choice consists of a bag of control constructs from which one and only one construct (whose preconditions are satisfied) is chosen for execution.
CollectionControlConstruct Just another layer of abstraction for control constructs that are either based on bags (such as AnyOrder or Split), or lists (such as Sequence).
CompositeProcess  
Conditional General interface to define a conditional constructs such as IfThenElse, RepeatWhile, etc.
ControlConstruct  
ControlConstructVisitor In contrast to ExecutionSupport, this interface realizes a general visitor pattern for control constructs intended for public use.
ForEach  
IfThenElse An If-Then-Else is a binary branching construct.
Iterate This is super interface for loop based control constructs such as RepeatUntil, RepeatWhile, and the non OWL-S standard ForEach.
MultiConditional General interface to define a multi-conditional constructs such as Process, Result, etc.
Perform Corresponding OWL-S concept: org.mindswap.owls.vocabulary.OWLS.Process#Perform
Process Abstract representation of OWL-S processes.
Produce  
RepeatUntil This constructs executes its inner operation (i.e.
RepeatWhile This construct tests for the condition, exits if it is true, and otherwise loops by executing its inner operation (i.e.
Result  
Sequence Sequence is a chain of constructs which is executed sequentially one after another, according to the order of the constructs.
Set  
SimpleProcess Simple processes provide an (optional) level of abstraction.
Split Split consists of a bag of processes which are executed concurrently.
SplitJoin Split-join consists of a bag of processes which are executed concurrently.
